<style>
@import url('https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Playfair+Display:wght@400;600;700&family=Source+Sans+Pro:wght@300;400;600&display=swap');

:root {
    --primary-green: #3A7D44;
    --accent-green: #5BA366;
    --data-blue: #2E86AB;
}

.homepage-hero {
    text-align: center;
    max-width: 900px;
    margin: 6rem auto auto auto;
    animation: fadeInUp 1.5s ease-out;
}

body {
    text-align: center;
}

.quarto-container {

}

.motto {
    font-family: 'Playfair Display', serif;
    font-size: 2.8rem;
    font-weight: 600;
    line-height: 1.3;
    color: var(--primary-green);
    text-shadow: 2px 2px 4px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1);
    padding: 4rem 0 0 0;
}

.motto::before {
    content: """;
    position: absolute;
    left: -1rem;
    font-size: 4rem;
    color: var(--accent-green);
    opacity: 0.7;
    font-family: serif;
}

.motto::after {
    content: """;
    position: absolute;
    right: -1rem;
    font-size: 4rem;
    color: var(--accent-green);
    opacity: 0.7;
    font-family: serif;
}

.motto-highlight {
    background: linear-gradient(120deg, var(--accent-green) 0%, var(--primary-green) 100%);
    -webkit-background-clip: text;
    -webkit-text-fill-color: transparent;
    background-clip: text;
    font-weight: 700;
    position: relative;
}

.motto-emphasis {
    color: var(--accent-green);
    font-style: italic;
    font-weight: 700;
}

.logo-container {
    animation: scaleIn 1s ease-out 0.5s both;
}

.homepage-logo {
    width: 600px;
    height: 600px;
    border-radius: 50%;
    box-shadow: 0 10px 30px rgba(58, 125, 68, 0.2);
    transition: all 0.5s ease;
    border: 4px solid rgba(58, 125, 68, 0.1);
    margin: 0 auto;
    display: block;
}

.homepage-logo:hover {
    transform: scale(1.05);
    box-shadow: 0 15px 40px rgba(58, 125, 68, 0.3);
}

.decorative-line {
    width: 500px;
    height: 3px;
    background: linear-gradient(90deg, var(--accent-green), var(--primary-green));
    margin:  2rem auto;
    border-radius: 2px;
    position: relative;
    animation: expandLine 1s ease-out 1s both;
}

.decorative-line::before,
.decorative-line::after {
    content: '';
    position: absolute;
    width: 8px;
    height: 8px;
    background: var(--data-blue);
    border-radius: 50%;
    top: -2.5px;
}

.decorative-line::before {
    left: -12px;
}

.decorative-line::after {
    right: -12px;
}

@keyframes fadeInUp {
    from {
        opacity: 0;
        transform: translateY(30px);
    }
    to {
        opacity: 1;
        transform: translateY(0);
    }
}

@keyframes scaleIn {
    from {
        opacity: 0;
        transform: scale(0.8);
    }
    to {
        opacity: 1;
        transform: scale(1);
    }
}

@keyframes expandLine {
    from {
        width: 0;
    }
    to {
        width: 500px;
    }
}

@media (max-width: 768px) {
    .motto {
        font-size: 2.2rem;
        padding: 0 1rem;
    }
    
    .motto::before,
    .motto::after {
        font-size: 3rem;
    }
    
    .homepage-logo {
        width: 280px;
        height: 280px;
    }
}

@media (max-width: 480px) {
    .motto {
        font-size: 1.8rem;
        padding: 0 0.5rem;
    }
    
    .motto::before {
        left: -0.5rem;
        top: -0.5rem;
        font-size: 2.5rem;
    }
    
    .motto::after {
        right: -0.5rem;
        bottom: -0.5rem;
        font-size: 2.5rem;
    }
    
    .homepage-logo {
        width: 220px;
        height: 220px;
    }
}
</style>
